addedtoqueue: You are offline; your operation has been added to the task queue.
areyousurereset: Are you sure you want to reset the application? All of your sites will be deleted.
author: Author
cannotconnect: Cannot connect: Verify that the URL is correct and your site uses Totara 2.6 or later.
cannotconnectssl: Cannot connect: Verify that the URL is correct, your site uses Totara 2.6 or later and the SSL certificate is valid.

contactadd: Contact added to your phone contacts list

enableautosyncws: Enable synchronization of operations and data
errorcameramsg: Device does not support a camera
feedback-questions-failure: Unable to retrieve feedback questions from the server.

feedback-page-after-submit-message: Please select continue to return to the course page
helpmelogin:
In order to log in, please verify that:

1. The Totara site is version 2.6 or above.
2. The Totara site administrator has enabled Mobile access.
imagestored: Your image has been stored in your private area
invalidaccount: Please check your login details or ask your site administrator to check the site configuration.
invalidmoodleversion: Invalid Totara version. The minium version required is:
invalidscheme: Please provide a valid site URL.
lostconnection: We lost connection you need to reconnect. Your token is now invalid
name: Name
networkerrormsg: Network not enabled or not working.
notificationsnotsupported: Notifications are not yet supported on Android systems.
participants-no-courses: No courses returned from web service
rdebuggingenabledfor: Remote debugging will be enabled during the following seconds:
recordstored: Your recording has been stored in your private area
reportbuginfo:
Tap on the email button for sending a bug report via email

Don't forget to write a detailed description of the problem in the email body

Note that some debugging information will be attached (not private information)
requiredfields: All required fields must be completed.
siteurlrequired: Site URL required, i.e http://www.yourtotarasite.abc or https://www.yourtotarasite.efg
therearentnotificationsyet: There are not yet any notifications
unexpectederror: Unexepected error. Please close and reopen the application to try again
uploadingtoprivatefiles: Uploading to your private files area
welcome: Welcome to the Totara mobile app
writeherethebug: Write here a detailed description of the problem
externalpassword: Please enter your password to continue
unsupportedactivity: This activity / resource is not accessible via the mobile app.
scorm-attemptsmade: Number of attempts you have made:
url-instructional-text: Click the link below to open the resource.

self-enrol-error: Please check the enrolment key and try again.
author: Author
scorm-fails-to-load: If the SCORM fails to load, please use the button to try reloading it.
